00011 #ifndef SYSAPI_HH
00012 # define SYSAPI_HH
00013 
00014 // Address the subsystem portability issue
00015 // at the compile time, by aliasing the sysapi
00016 // namespace to the correct one.
00017 // _SYSAPI has to be defined one the command line,
00018 // and must be affected with the following values:
00019 // {win32, posix}.
00020 
00021 #if _SYSAPI == 1
00022 # include <posix.hh>
00023 namespace sysapi = posix;
00024 
00025 #elif _SYSAPI == 2
00026 # include <win32.hh>
00027 namespace sysapi = win32;
00028 
00029 #else
00030 # error SYSAPI NOT UNDERSTOOD
00031 #endif // ! _SYSAPI
00032 
00033 
00034 
00035 // - Doxygen comments start from here
00036 
00042 
00043 
00044 #endif // ! SYSAPI_HH
